page.title: 04RELIGION MUTHILL PARISH KIRK
page.content: The church is a handsome sandstone building erected in {1826} and the bell was added in {1828. }In the vestibule are memorial plaques. The collection plates are of pewter and dated {1808.}The church can seat 1400 but the roll in 1985 is {420}.A recent alteration is the division into the main seating area with a small hall at the rear of the church for use with smaller groups. This was named the { {Bruce Hall},after the previous minister, Rev. Duncan Bruce. The gallery is no longer in use apart from the taking of video films at weddings.The present minister is the { {Rev. Stanley Strachan} who is also chaplain to the school and takes a short service each week.The clock is now back in working order and welcomed as the return of an "old friend".
